bV: Someone wants to trap you here...
Help! im trapped here too! free me and i will help you.

a~: I thought bowser was still on the moon!
No time to explain! Find your friends, they'll help!
With my friends, im bound to save Luigi!
maybe he wanted to lure us all here!
we need to find a way out!
I'm just checking in, are you enjoying your trap?
hold on, why are you trapping us?
wierd, it seems like he forgot
but we know who we're saving, let's go!
It looks like Mayhem has run out of things to trap us with
I still don't understand what he wanted to do with us
well, I wouldn't wait to find out
I see one last flag over there! Let's go!
